summary: The test package supplies a comprehensive pytest-based suite that validates every aspect of the Albumentations image augmentation library, including core composition logic, individual transforms, bounding‑box and keypoint handling, mask preservation, serialization, domain adaptation, blur, cropping, mixing, PyTorch integration, Pydantic validation, version checking, and auxiliary utilities for generating synthetic data and mocking I/O.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness, stability, and regression‑free evolution of the Albumentations library by automatically checking that all augmentation operations behave as expected across diverse data types, image formats, and edge cases, thereby supporting reliable deployment in computer‑vision pipelines.
